#id=1
#text=A friend of mine told me about a book she liked and I wanted to read it .
#id=2
#text=I did n't want to buy the book , though , so I decided to go to the library .
#id=3
#text=When I first got to the library , I had to register for a library card because you ca n't check out books without it .
#id=4
#text=So , I went to the front desk , filled out a form and then waited .
#id=5
#text=The lady at the desk made my library card right then and handed it to me .
#id=6
#text=Then I asked her where I would find the book I was looking for and she showed me the right bookshelves .
#id=7
#text=I located the book right away and took it from the shelf , but then I stayed to look around for more books .
#id=8
#text=The library has a card catalog where you can look up any book you want and the catalog will tell you which shelf to go to for the book .
#id=9
#text=So , I used the card catalog to find two more books and then took all my books back to the front desk to check them out .
#text=The lady at the front desk scanned a bar code in the back of the book and that registered them as checked out to me .
#text=She told me I would have four weeks to read them .
#text=After she was finished , I picked up the books and left the library .
